title: Faithwarden's Vines
content:
Faithwarden's Vines Effect Vines sprout from the ground, turning it into difficult terrain and possibly Entangling creatures within. Equipment Paleoak

Faithwarden's Vines

Vines sprout from the ground, turning it into difficult terrain and possibly Entangling creatures within.

Faithwarden's Vines is an Equipment Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Equipment Features provide passive effects or new conditions that will help you in combat. These features are gained by simply wielding the corresponding it
